title: Infant mortality rate in Greece 2018
summary: In general Deaths per 1,000 live births has rose over the Year.
Deaths per 1,000 live births is roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, gradually increasing from 2011 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and finally slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Deaths per 1,000 live births, about 3.8 was reported at Year 2015, and 2016
Minimum Deaths per 1,000 live births about 3.3 was reached at Year 2010, and 2011
